text: وَلَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَهُ ٱلدِّينُ وَاصِبًاۚ أَفَغَيۡرَ ٱللَّهِ تَتَّقُونَ

translation.en: And to Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth, and to Him is [due] worship constantly. Then is it other than Allah that you fear
translation.id: Dan milik-Nya meliputi segala apa yang ada di langit dan di bumi, dan kepada-Nyalah (ibadah dan) ketaatan selama-lamanya. Mengapa kamu takut kepada selain Allah
